title: Painting with Sponges
note: Provided paint, paper, and sponges, the children will be encouraged to apply paint to the paper and describe what they are making

title: Balance Beam
note: Outside, the children will be encouraged to walk across the balance beam independently

title: Making Playdough
note: Using a recipe and assisted by a teacher, the children will help add ingredients and stir mixture until it makes playdough

title: The Cat in the Hat
note: The children will listen to the Cat in the Hat by Dr. Seuss. They will be asked to describe what they notice and what they think might happen next
